trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_SEQ_00<tab>Hirase is pondering what to make the Confederates for <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_TODO_00<tab>Obtain slabs of hearty gyuki meat from gyuki.
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the slabs of hearty gyuki meat to Hirase.

TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_000<tab>Bah! You scared me! I was just contemplating what to make the hungry men and women of Onokoro for <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var>. As the resident chef, it is my responsibility to see that they are provided with good, nutritious meals.
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_001<tab>I think today we will be having a pirate's stew. Makes your mouth water, doesn't it?

TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_002<tab>Problem is, I am missing a key ingredient. <sigh> Our revenue from the Ruby Tithe has been slowly declining and the treasurer has cut down on my budget. I am now unable to afford the juicy meat that makes this stew a proper pirate's stew.

TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_003<tab>Regardless, it is my job to find a way to keep our pirates healthy and full. That means I must find an alternative way to procure my meats. Perhaps you could assist me?

TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_004<tab>To the west of here are wild gyuki. Might you kill a few and bring me back slabs of this meat? In the meantime, I will go and search the sea for other foods to put into the stew.
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_005<tab>Please bring back a few slabs of meat from the wild gyuki wandering to the west of here.
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_011<tab>You have brought me back my meat? Fantastic! Simply fantastic! With this, my stew is now complete!
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_020<tab>Do you smell that, my good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var>? Now, that is the smell of a proper meal!
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_021<tab>Once we slide the hot stones into the pot, and the seawater begins to boil the seafood and meat, the already heavenly aroma will become all the sweeter!

TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_022<tab>We have the Ruby Sea to thank for such a luxurious bounty. By her we are blessed and in partaking of her food we shall be protected─unless you are foolish enough to swallow one of the hot stones, that is! Hahaha!
TEXT_STMBDZ212_02684_HIRASE_000_023<tab>Thank you for your help, my friend. I hope this shall suffice as payment for your services.
